history.proof: intros d pl0 pl1 tl H1 H2. hauto use: union_pl_r_0, union_pl_r_1 inv: term_list.

ctx: intros d pl0 pl1 tl H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA pl0, pl1 : prec_list tl : term_list H11 : pl0 = prec_empty /\\ pl1 = prec_empty H2 : liste_reconnait d (union_pl pl0 pl1) tl Unable to unify "liste_reconnait ?M1860 (union_pl ?M1861 ?M1862) tl" with "liste_reconnait d pl0 tl".

ctx: intros d pl0 pl1 tl H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros d pl0 pl1 tl H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA pl0, pl1 : prec_list tl : term_list H12 : pl0 <> prec_empty /\\ pl1 <> prec_empty H2 : liste_reconnait d (union_pl pl0 pl1) tl Unable to unify "liste_reconnait ?M1863 (union_pl ?M1864 ?M1865) tl" with "liste_reconnait d pl1 tl".

original: simpl. intros d pl0 pl1 tl H1 H2. unfold pl_compat in H1. destruct H1 as [H11 | H12]. - left. apply union_pl_0d with (tl:=tl); auto. - right. apply union_pl_1d with (tl:=tl); auto.
